Package de.mnl.osgi.jul2osgi.lib

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    LogRecordHandler
    Called by LogManager in order to send the LogRecord to the OSGi log service.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ForwardingLogger
    A Logger that forwards the LogRecords to OSGi.
    LogManager
    An implementation of LogManager.
    LogManager.LogInfo
    Holds the information from a logger invocation.
